title: Logged In User
custom_preconds:
Prerequisite - Remote Config Setup for: Version Dialog configuration
1. Go to Firebase -> Remote Config (links below)
2. Edit "version_rules" as needed to force display. (One way is to set the minimum version to a value greater than current version of BP app installed.)
3. Save changes.
4. Publish changes.

BE CAUTIOUS WHEN UPDATING PROD CONFIGURATION AS CHANGES WOULD BE WITNESSED TO LIVE USER

Remote Configs 
[Ballpark QA App](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-mobile-npd/config)
[Ballpark](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-ballpark-app-831/config)
(can have condition set up to differentiate desired behavior for different envs/platform)

CONFIGURATION TROUBLESHOOTING NOTES:
*Only change 'minimumVersion' to validate Force Upgrade specifically (setting a higher version than current build)
*Format of the version requires release number, major version, and minor version - ex: 11.1.0 (11.1 will not work)
*Verify condition is what is expected (if using condition) - ex: verify 'Android QA' isn't tied to a specific version of the app that may not apply to version being tested
custom_steps:
GIVEN Ballpark app installed with version prior to minimum version established in version_rules within remote config
WHEN User is logged in
custom_expected: THEN force update prompt appears on customer's current page

custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN Force Dialog is presented without option to dismiss (forcing an update_
AND an Update button

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User taps on Update button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN app launches external to app store

title: [Android] Logged Out User
custom_preconds:
Prerequisite - Remote Config Setup for: Version Dialog configuration
1. Go to Firebase -> Remote Config (links below)
2. Edit "version_rules" as needed to force display. (One way is to set the minimum version to a value greater than current version of BP app installed.)
3. Save changes.
4. Publish changes.

BE CAUTIOUS WHEN UPDATING PROD CONFIGURATION AS CHANGES WOULD BE WITNESSED TO LIVE USER

Remote Configs 
[Ballpark QA App](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-mobile-npd/config)
[Ballpark](https://console.firebase.google.com/u/0/project/mlb-ballpark-app-831/config)
(can have condition set up to differentiate desired behavior for different envs/platform)


NOTE: with iOS 11.0 Release, Logged Out User no longer witnesses the Force Upgrade message until after logging in. iOS has shifted to use OneSignal In-App Upgrade message which will prompt user whenever app is opened (regardless of state)

CONFIGURATION TROUBLESHOOTING NOTES:
*Only change 'minimumVersion' to validate Force Upgrade specifically (setting a higher version than current build)
*Format of the version requires release number, major version, and minor version - ex: 11.1.0 (11.1 will not work)
*Verify condition is what is expected (if using condition) - ex: verify 'Android QA' isn't tied to a specific version of the app that may not apply to version being tested
custom_steps:
GIVEN Ballpark app installed with version prior to minimum version established in version_rules within remote config
WHEN User is logged out
custom_expected: THEN force update prompt appears before onboarding on Get Started page

custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN force update prompt appears before onboarding atop Get Started page
THEN Force Dialog is presented without option to dismiss (forcing user to update)
AND an Update button

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN User taps on Update button
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN app launches external to app store
